subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Morten Andersen has this down pat. Sit out training camp. Watch the first two games on television while sipping some beer. Then report to the Atlanta Falcons armed with plenty of old-man jokes.
snippet: Morten Andersen has this down pat. Sit out training camp. Watch the first two games on television while sipping some beer. Then report to the Atlanta Falcons armed with plenty of old-man jokes.
